amendment.description: Amendment authorizes $1.2 billion for the Weatherization Assistance Program for fiscal year 2007.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in part B of House Report 110-300 to double the current level of funding for 2007 and 2008 for the weatherization assistance program in section 9034(a).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Shays amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
